General.Name: Star Pacific Tbk
General.Description: PT Star Pacific Tbk, through its subsidiaries, invests in and leases property in Indonesia. It engages in real estate activities, which include owned or leased properties and real estate on a contract basis; and management consulting activities. The company also publishes newspaper, journals, bulletins, and magazines; and offers information technology and other computer services activities. In addition, it engages in general trading, mass media, and advertising agency. The company was formerly known as PT Lippo ENet Tbk and changed its name to PT Star Pacific Tbk in November 2008. The company was founded in 1983 and is based in Tangerang, Indonesia. PT Star Pacific Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Inti Anugerah Pratama.
General.Address: Graha Lippo, Lantai LG, Tangerang, Indonesia, 15810
